body_html:
Hi everyone,
I have a question. How can I force certain dimensionality of the output of the conv2d_transpose layer ? My problem is that I use it for upsampling and I want to match the dimensionality of my labels and the output of the NN, for example if I have a feature map as Bx25x40xC how can I make it Bx100x160xC (i.e. upsample exactly 4x times) ?
body_text:

body:
Hi everyone,
I have a question. How can I force certain dimensionality of the output of the conv2d_transpose layer ? My problem is that I use it for upsampling and I want to match the dimensionality of my labels and the output of the NN, for example if I have a feature map as Bx25x40xC how can I make it Bx100x160xC (i.e. upsample exactly 4x times) ?
